reviewText: My Grandchildern and I enjoyed everything about these two original movies! There's nothing like the Classic!
I bought this DVD for the Apes movies and found it a great transfer.  I also likes the Kurt Russell film when I had it on vHS and was glad to be able to see it again.

This is probably one of the better double features I have, only because they are two great movies with a ton of special features. Big Trouble in Little China is a great action movie while Planet of the Apes is my favorite Sci-Fi thriller. A great deal for four bucks.
